data.name: Help_CmdLineArguments
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineBooleanOperators
data.value: /bo [True/False] -bo [True/False] -booleanOperators [True/False] 設定布林運算元搜尋旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineCaseSensitive
data.value: /cs [True/False] -cs [True/False] -caseSensitive [True/False] 設定區分大小寫旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineCSVReport
data.value: /csv [filePath] -csv [filePath] 搜尋完成後以 CSV 格式建立搜尋結果檔案.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineDefaultArguments
data.value: 任何未指定的引數將預設為最後儲存的使用者設定.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineDotAsNewline
data.value: /dn [True/False] -dn [True/False] -dotAsNewline [True/False] 設定點號(.)搜尋包含換行字元搜尋旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineExample1
data.value: dnGrep [arguments] 使用下列任一組合引數. 範例: dnGrep /f "C:\Program Files\dnGrep" /pm *.txt;*.xml /s t\w*t /st Regex
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineExample2
data.value: dnGrep [folderPath] [searchFor] 一個或二個無旗標引數: 第一個引數為搜尋資料夾路徑, 第二個引數為用於搜尋的正則運算式. 範例: dnGrep "C:\Program Files\dnGrep" t\w*t
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineExit
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineFolder
data.value: /f [folderPath] -f [folderPath] -folder [folderPath] 設定搜尋資料夾路徑, 可以是逗號或分隔符號的檔案路徑清單.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineHeader
data.value: dnGrep: 搜尋純文字檔案, Word 和 Excel 文檔, PDF, 壓縮檔, 正則運算式, XPath, 及拼音查詢.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineMultiline
data.value: /ml [True/False] -ml [True/False] -multiline [True/False] 設定多行搜尋旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLinePathToIgnore
data.value: /pi [pattern] -pi [pattern] -pathToIgnore [pattern] 設定搜尋路徑中的排除檔案名稱或目錄樣式, 可以是逗號或分隔符號的樣式.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLinePathToMatch
data.value: /pm [pattern] -pm [pattern] -pathToMatch [pattern] 設定搜尋路徑中的檔案名稱樣式, 可以是逗號或分隔符號的樣式.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLinePatternType
data.value: /pt [type] -pt [type] -patternType [type] 設定符合或忽略樣式的類型 - 必須為其一: "星號" (萬用字元), "Regex" (正則運算式), 或 "Everything" (若 Everything 搜尋工具已安裝).
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineReport
data.value: /rpt [filePath] -rpt [filePath] -report [filePath] 搜尋完成後以報告格式建立搜尋結果檔案.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineSearchFor
data.value: /s [searchFor] -s [searchFor] -searchFor [searchFor] 設定所欲搜尋樣式或文字. 當此引數已設定, 將會自動搜尋.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineSearchType
data.value: /st [type] -st [type] -searchType [type] 設定搜尋類型 - 必須為其一: "純文字", "Regex" (正則運算式), "XPath", 或 "Soundex" (拼音).
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineTextReport
data.value: /txt [filePath] -txt [filePath] -text [filePath] 搜尋完成後以文字格式建立搜尋結果檔案.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineUsage
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineVersion
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line: 0 is the installed dnGrep version number; 1 is the installed dnGrep build date

data.name: Help_CmdLineWholeWord
data.value: /ww [True/False] -ww [True/False] -wholeWord [True/False] 設定全字符合搜尋旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.comment: Help dialog window title

data.comment: Help dialog button label

data.name: Help_OneOrMoreArgumentsAreInvalid
data.value: 一個或多個引數不合法.
data.comment: Help dialog header text

data.name: Help_CmdLineUniqueValues
data.value: /unique [True/False] -unique [True/False] -uniqueValues [True/False] 設定正則運算式輸出報告中輸出唯一符合值或組旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineListItemSeparator
data.value: /sep [separator character or text] -sep [separator character or text] -listItemSeparator [separator character or text] 設定字元或字串以分隔輸出報表中一行上的列表項目旗標.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineFileInformation
data.value: /fi [True/False] -fi [True/False] -fileInformation [True/False] 設定輸出報告中包含檔案和行訊息旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineReportMode
data.value: /rm [mode] -rm [mode] -reportMode [mode] 設定正則運算式報告輸出模式 - 必須是以下之一: "FullLine", "Matches", 或 "Groups".
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineSeparateLines
data.value: /sl [True/False] -sl [True/False] -separateLines [True/False] 設定正則運算式輸出報告中單行輸出每個符合項或組旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineTrimWhitespace
data.value: /trim [True/False] -trim [True/False] -trimWhitespace [True/False] 設定輸出報告去除空白旗標 - True 或 False.
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line

data.name: Help_CmdLineUniqueScope
data.value: /scope [scope] -scope [scope] -uniqueScope [scope] 設定正則運算式輸出報告中唯一值範圍旗標 - 必須是以下之一: "Global" 或 "PerFile".
data.comment: Help dialog text when running dnGrep from the command-line
